name: serverless-externals-plugin
description: Only include external node modules and their dependencies in Serverless

scripts.test:setup-packages: ls -d test/packages/*/ | xargs -I {} bash -c "cd '{}' && npm pack"
scripts.test:npm-projects: ls -d test/npm-projects/*/ | xargs -I {} bash -c "cd '{}' && npm i && rollup -c && node --unhandled-rejections=strict test/run.test.js && node --unhandled-rejections=strict test/contents.test.js"
scripts.test:serverless-projects: ls -d test/serverless-projects/*/ | xargs -I {} bash -c "cd '{}' && npm i && rollup -c && serverless package && node --unhandled-rejections=strict test/contents.test.js"

author: Hans Otto Wirtz <hansottowirtz@gmail.com>
